mapper.select: SELECT M.ORG_BANK ,M.ORG_CD ,M.VACCT_NO ,L.TR_DATE ,L.TR_SEQ ,L.STAT_CD AS DET_STAT_CD ,M.STAT_CD ,M.IN_GB ,M.PAY_AMT ,M.PAY_FROM_DATE ,M.PAY_TO_DATE ,M.PAY_TO_TIME ,M.CUST_CD ,M.CUST_NM ,L.ERROR_CD ,L.TR_TIME ,L.TR_AMT ,L.IN_BANK_CD ,L.IN_BANK_BRANCH ,L.IN_NAME ,L.ERP_PROC_YN ,L.ENTRY_DATE ,L.ENTRY_IDNO FROM TB_RVAS_MAST M INNER JOIN TB_RVAS_LIST L ON M.ORG_BANK = L.ORG_BANK AND M.ORG_CD = L.ORG_CD AND M.VACCT_NO = L.VACCT_NO AND (CASE WHEN L.ERP_PROC_YN IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE L.ERP_PROC_YN END) != 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND M.STAT_CD != '2' AND M.ORG_BANK = #{orgBank} AND M.ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND (CASE WHEN L.ERP_PROC_YN IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE L.ERP_PROC_YN END) != 'Y' AND M.CUST_CD IS NOT NULL ORDER BY L.TR_DATE ASC, L.TR_SEQ ASC, L.STAT_CD ASC

SELECT TR_DATE, TR_SEQ, ORG_BANK, ORG_CD, VACCT_NO, STAT_CD, CUST_CD, CUST_NM, ERROR_CD, TR_TIME, TR_AMT, IN_BANK_CD, IN_BANK_BRANCH, IN_NAME, ENTRY_DATE, ENTRY_IDNO, ERP_PROC_YN, ERP_PROC_DT FROM TB_RVAS_LIST WHERE TR_DATE >= Convert(varchar(10),Getdate() -15 , 112)
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_RVAS_LIST SET IN_NAMEAA = '조윤재' WHERE VACCT_NO ='54301380097401'
UPDATE TB_RVAS_MAST SET CUST_NM = '조윤재2' WHERE VACCT_NO = '54301376497809'
